Standing Order: CR Standing Order Arrangement Instance Record
column4: Fulfill any scheduled and ad-hoc obligations under a service arrangement, most typically for a financial product or facility  within Standing Order. . Example: Perform the scheduled (e.g. statements, standing orders) and ad-hoc/requested (e.g. balance inquiries, fund transfers) fulfillment tasks for a customer current account facility.
